description: This file defines data schemas for a Tic-Tac-Toe web application backend using Pydantic models. It includes class definitions for players, moves, games, and related data structures, along with type aliases for game symbols and statuses.

classes.name: PlayerCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new player, requiring a unique name.

classes.name: PlayerOut
classes.description: Schema for returning player details, including ID, name, and creation timestamp.

classes.name: GameCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new game, optionally specifying player names for X and O.

classes.name: MoveCreate
classes.description: Schema for recording a move, including position and player symbol, with validation.

classes.name: MoveOut
classes.description: Schema for outputting move details, including move number, position, player, and timestamp.

classes.name: GameOut
classes.description: Schema for outputting game state, including board, next player, status, winner, players, and move history.

classes.name: GamesListOut
classes.description: Schema for listing multiple game summaries.

methods.name: validate_consistency
methods.description: Validator method for MoveCreate to ensure the player symbol is either 'X' or 'O'.
